page.title: 17Page 17 Events-The Last Week
page.content: FRIDAY- The final Service was held in the Chapel at Goring Heath at 2.00pm. The Chaplain officiated and the head- master read the lesson. The children sang a new tune to 'All things bright and beautiful'as well as 3 more favourite hymns. After the service the pupils each received a Bible from the Charity. A goblet inscribed with the school's name was given to each child in memory of Henry Alnut,the founder. In school the children had their swimming certificates and each had chosen a leavers' book. The Head had a gardening book from the children. The staff also received a book each and the Head gave the ladies flowers. The children then enjoyed a tea party. Goring Heath Endowed C/E School closed its doors as a school after 259 years on JULY 19TH 1985.
